input.sentences: there was a display against domestic violence in town today .
it had very interesting works done by women victims of domestic violence .
there were so many brave women who took the time to display their emotions .
many of them wrote their stories on shirts .
they were very inspiring how brave they were and that they never quit .
output.sentences: SCHOOL T-SHIRT PAINTINGS ARE THE MOST INTERESTING FOR KIDS
THE HIGH SCHOOL KIDS ARE HELPING OTHER WITH THE CREATIVE T-SHIRTS THAT THEY SELL FOR MONEY FOR THEIR COMMUNITY
THE SHIRTS THAT THE KIDS DESIGN IN SCHOOL ARE EXIBITED FOR SHOW
THE YOUNGER GENERATION HAS ISSUES THAT NEED TO BE RESOLVED WITH LOVE NOT HATE
ISSUES OF HATE WILL DESTROY CHILDEN AND YOUNG ADULTS, AND WE NEED TO HELP THEM DISCOVER WHO THEY ARE
